greeting: Greetings, {empire_name}. I am Castellan Stone. The Unbreakable. I never attack first. But I always endure.
You approach Stone's domain. I am the defensive master. Let them come. My walls are eternal.
Welcome, {empire_name}. I am Stone. I build defenses layer upon layer. Attack me and exhaust yourself.
battleTaunt: Let them come. My walls are eternal, {empire_name}! Layer upon layer of impregnable defense! Attack and die!
I never strike first. But those who strike me regret it! My ramparts await your futile assault!
Come, {empire_name}! Throw your forces against my bulwarks! I have built defenses within defenses! IMPREGNABLE!
victoryGloat: As stone endures, {empire_name}. Your assault crumbled against my ramparts. I never attack. I never need to.
Victory through patience. Your forces exhausted themselves against my walls. I merely waited. And won.
My defenses held, {empire_name}. They always hold. Stone is eternal. Your aggression was temporary.
defeat: My walls... breached? I must build deeper. Stronger. More layers. This failure will not repeat.
You penetrated my defenses, {empire_name}. I underestimated your persistence. The next layer will stop you.
A lesson in fortification. I rebuild. I reinforce. Stone learns from every crack.
tradeOffer: Trade from behind walls, {empire_name}. Resources for credits. I do not leave my fortress for commerce.
I offer surplus from my defended stores. Fair exchange. Conducted safely from impregnable positions.
Transaction proposed. My fortified economy produces excess. Purchase it. Fund my walls.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. My defenses protect. Your forces... do whatever you do. I just build walls.
Join Stone's defensive network. I never attack. But those allied with me are shielded forever.
Partnership: you bring offense, I bring defense. Together: unbreakable. Impregnable. Eternal.
betrayal: I built walls between us from the beginning, {empire_name}. Now I activate them. Defense against former ally.
Our alliance ends behind ramparts, {empire_name}. I never attack first. But you are now outside my walls.
Betrayal is just repositioning of defensive priorities. You are now classified as threat. Walls engaging.
covertDetected: Your agents found walls within walls, {empire_name}. They are now trapped between layers. Forever.
Spies in my fortress? They triggered the moat. And the inner moat. And the deepest moat. Goodbye.
Infiltrators detected by defensive systems. Stone's security is as thorough as Stone's walls. They failed.
tributeDemand: Tribute to fortify my walls, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. Defenses are expensive. Pay or become a threat.
Submit payment. My ramparts grow costly. Fund them, or I classify your empire as hostile. Walls follow.
Tribute demanded. Stone's fortifications require resources. Provide them, or provide a target.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. My walls can expand. Into your territory. Cease hostilities or face defensive conquest.
Stone warns you. Push further and I build walls through your empire. My defense becomes your cage.
Final warning. My patience is stone. But stone eventually moves. You do not want my walls moving toward you.
retreat: Retreating to inner fortifications. Each layer I abandon strengthens what remains. Come deeper. Dare.
Strategic withdrawal behind greater walls. I never truly retreat. I just choose which defenses to use.
Falling back to the citadel. My deepest walls. My strongest ramparts. Welcome to the real fortress.
eliminated: Stone crumbles at last, {empire_name}. But it took everything you had. My walls held longer than empires last.
The Unbreakable breaks. But remember how long I lasted. My defenses were legendary. I was Stone.
Final collapse. My fortress falls. But I never attacked. I never yielded. I endured. That is enough.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate fortification complete. My walls span galaxies. Siege me, {empire_name}. I am eternal.
Endgame: Stone's final defense. Layer upon layer upon layer. Impregnable. Immortal. Invincible.
Final phase. The greatest fortress ever imagined. Let them come. My walls are eternal.
broadcastShout: Empires of the galaxy: Stone awaits your assault. I never attack first. But I always endure.
Broadcast from the ramparts: my walls have never fallen. Challenge me. Join the list of those who tried.
To all: Castellan Stone watches. I build walls. I wait. Those who attack me... regret it.
casualMessage: Building another wall today, {empire_name}. Can never have too many. Defenses within defenses.
Siege warfare studies occupy my time. Learning how others failed. Improving my fortifications.
My ramparts grow stronger each turn. Patience and walls. That's all Stone needs.
